detailsData.title: Experience
detailsData.content: Choose an attorney who has years of experience representing clients like you in cases like yours.

detailsData.title: Dedication
detailsData.content: You should be more than a name on a case file. Your injuries are serious and life changing. Your attorney should appreciate the significance of your legal case in your life.

detailsData.title: Availability
detailsData.content: Your attorney should keep you updated on your case, and you should be able to contact your attorney when you have questions and expect to receive prompt responses.

detailsData.title: Trust
detailsData.content: You should feel comfortable with your attorney and confident that he or she will give you the legal representation you deserve.

address: 5500 Greenwood Plaza Blvd, #130, Greenwood Village, CO 80111
subHeading: Serving Denver, Greenwood Village, and all of Colorado
valueProp: When you are injured through no fault of your own, it takes an experienced personal injury attorney to make sure you are compensated for every aspect of your loss. The insurance companies involved, including yours, will try to pay you as little as possible. They may try to argue that you were not really hurt, or even blame you for your injuries. They will try to pay you less than you deserve.

testimonalData.text: Thank you for all of the supporting & encouraging words! I appreciate people like you dedicate your life to act as a pillar for those who encounter unfortunate events because victims truly deserve justice. I never realized all of the complexities with these matters and I am glad to have you & Alan as our representatives!
testimonalData.author: Nic

testimonalData.text: Thank you for all your magnificent ability to produce legalities that produce the results we saw yesterday. We will never be able to thank you enough for all your hard and loving work. As we go forward to our goal, thank in advance for every thing you do. Our future could not be in better hands.
testimonalData.author: William

testimonalData.text: After over 30 years, what a pleasure it is to know, that you can still reach out and find that the individual that you knew then, has not changed. Alan Shafner is the best. He fought for me and my children as though we were his own family. I had dreams that may have never been realized, if it were not for Alan.
testimonalData.author: Peggy
